## Loading Required Packages
Here we will load the 'Tidyverse' and 'palmer penguins' packages.
```{r Loading Packages}
library(tidyverse)
library(palmerpenguins)
library(dplyr)
library(ggplot2)
```

## Loading the dataset and storing it as a dataframe
```{r Loading Dataset}
data(penguins)
df = penguins
```

## Viewing dataframe
```{r}
View(df)
```

## The first few name of all columns of dataframe
```{r}
head(df)
colnames(df)
```
## Species and Islands
```{r}
df %>% 
  distinct(species)

df %>% 
  distinct(island)

df %>% 
  n_distinct(.$species)
```
## Visualizing Relationship between flipperlength and body mass
```{r}
ggplot(data = df, mapping = aes(x = flipper_length_mm, y = body_mass_g, color = species)) +
  geom_point() + 
  geom_smooth()
```
